original_text: “You shall keep my statutes. You shall not let your cattle breed with a different kind. You shall not sow your field with two kinds of seed, nor shall you wear a garment of cloth made of two kinds of material.
korean_text: 너희는 내 규례를 지킬지어다 네 가축을 다른 종류와 교미시키지 말며 네 밭에 두 종자를 섞어 뿌리지 말며 두 재료로 직조한 옷을 입지 말지며

sentences.original_text: You shall not let your cattle breed with a different kind.
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 가축을 다른 종류와 교배시키지 말라.

sentences.original_text: You shall not sow your field with two kinds of seed,
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 밭에 두 종류의 씨를 뿌리지 말며,

sentences.original_text: nor shall you wear a garment of cloth made of two kinds of material.
sentences.korean_translation: 두 종류의 실로 짠 옷을 입지도 말라.
